title: Torchere
description: Torchere; Attributed to André-Charles Boulle (French, 1642 - 1732, master before 1666); Paris, France; about 1680; Oak veneered with ebony, tortoise shell, blue painted horn, brass, and pewter, and set with gilt bronze mounts; 143.8 x 41.9 x 43.5 cm (56 5/8 x 16 1/2 x 17 1/8 in.); 87.DA.5.2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
